name: Gadgets and Utility
description:
Gadgets and Utilities
Unlock Grid Power and work through Extra Utilities 2, gain access to some useful OpenBlocks items and blocks, and unlock the ability to create extremely powerful mob farms from mob_grinding_utils.

quests.name: Enchant ALL the things!
quests.description: Craft an Auto Enchantment Table! You can automatically insert tools, armor or books inside to enchant them using liquid experience.

quests.name: Fill 'em with the smarts
quests.description: Craft an XP Bottler! This machine can fill up Empty Bottles with liquid experience pumped into it to create Bottles o' Enchanting. Everything can be automatically inserted and extracted.

quests.name: Unstable to Lunar
quests.description:
Craft some Unstable Ingots and upgrade them immediately into some Moon Stones before they blow up! Make sure to have every material in your inventory, and do the second step of the crafting under 10 seconds, before the Unstable Ingots gets you.

Or alternatively if you're rolling in Diamonds, you can spend 9 times the Diamond to craft Stable-'Unstable' Nuggets and put them together into a Stable-'Unstable' Ingot, which doesn't blow up, but can be used for crafting the same way.

quests.name: Oof, it got overcooked
quests.description: Craft some Stoneburnt in your Resonator! Don't sniff it too much, it's got an awful smell...

quests.name: Suck 'em all up, but better!
quests.description: Craft an Absorption Hopper! This functions very similarly to a Vacuum Hopper, except with range upgrades it can have WAAAY more range!

quests.name: If you're not a Fan-fan...
quests.description: An alternative way of moving mobs besides Fans are regular old Conveyor Belts! Mobs CAN spawn on these blocks, so if you want to, you can build your entire mob spawning platform out of these. However, I'd just use them sparingly since Cursed Earth and Mob Fans are way better.

quests.name: The Shining all over again
quests.description:
"Here is Goldey!"

Upgrade your Iron Spikes into Golden Ones. These might not deal as much damage, however anything killed by them drop experience!

quests.name: I want my fluids HERE!
quests.description: Craft a Transfer Node for Fluids! Similarly to its Item transferring variant, this one is also highly upgradable and filterable.

quests.name: Smite with Thor's thunder!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Smite Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will make the Masher stronger against undead foes like Zombies and Skeletons.

quests.name: Drink it and turn smart
quests.description: Use your Bottling Machine to fill Empty Bottles into Bottles o' Enchanting!

quests.name: Enchantin' away
quests.description: Craft an Extra Utilities Enchanter! This is another crafting mechanic in the mod. You'll need to setup bookshelves around it the same way you do for Enchantment Table, and power it with RF. You can upgrade it with Speed Upgrades and auto insert / extract items into / from it.

quests.name: The little devil inside
quests.description: Surround Lava on all 4 sides with Nether Bricks, then throw in some Gold Ingots to create some Demon Ingots. Alloy it with Lunar Reactive Dust to create Demonlord Ingots!

quests.name: Carved and swirly
quests.description: Use your Enchanter to make some Magical Wood! You might want to continously keep creating this for later use.

quests.name: I want my energy HERE!
quests.description: Craft a Transfer Node for Energy! Unlike its Item and Fluid variants, this one cannot be upgraded. It might still be better to use Immersive Engineering Wires at this stage (but not for long!).

quests.name: More colors, the better
quests.description: Craft some RF Dust! This will only take 1 durability point from your Thermal Conductor Rod.

quests.name: Crush them insects!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Bane of Arthrodops Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will make the Masher deal more damage against Arthropods like Spiders and Silverfish.

quests.name: Lot of manual work
quests.description: Craft a Manual Mill! While holding Right Click on it, you generate 15 GP (or Grid Power). This is a resource that doesn't need cables. Simply while you're generating X amount of GP, all your GP using machines will work granted you're using at most X amount of GP overall.

quests.name: Itty Bitty Reddy Gemmy
quests.description: Use your Resonator to create some Red Coal! Then use it to craft a Redstone Star!

quests.name: Fill it up!
quests.description: Craft a Stone Drum and upgrade it to an Iron Drum! It can hold 256 Buckets of any liquid, and you can Right Click on it to see how much is left. I would encourage you to set one up to feed Lava into your Smeltery.

quests.name: Dark hornes! Watch out!
quests.description:
Alloy some Demonlord Ingots with some Gunpowder to obtain your first pieces of Mobgrindium Ingots! This is the gateway into Mob Grinding Utils.

Note: If you're searching for Mob Grinding Utils in JEI, tpye @mob_grinding_utils.

quests.name: Better fluid storage
quests.description: Craft a Reinforced Large Drum! It can hold 4096 Buckets of any liquid! Wow!

quests.name: 3rd way to crush
quests.description: Craft an Extra Utilities Crusher! This is yet another way to turn your Ores and Ingots into Dust! It can be sped up by Extra Utilities Speed Upgrades to make it faster than the Immersive Engineering and Mekanism Crushers.

quests.name: This is how Ketchup's made
quests.description: Craft a Mob Masher! To activate it, use a redstone signal. This is a highly-upgradable mob killing machine that drops experience after every mob. Route mobs from your farm here, I'm sure they'll have a wonderful time!

quests.name: Lunar Larry
quests.description: Craft some Lunar Panels to be able to generate GP passively during the night!

quests.name: Lava Lewi
quests.description:
Craft a Lava Mill! This machine generates GP when and of its sides are touching lava blocks. Flowing Lava one block away from a source block generates the most GP. Having Lava on multiple sides doesn't increase the generation, but being in the Nether does slightly.

This generator has been buffed and generates 2x the normal amount.

quests.name: Green Lapis to Pink Lapis
quests.description: Craft some Osglolapis and turn it into Lunar Reactive Dust in your Resonator!

quests.name: Guillotines hurt
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Beheading Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will make the Masher drop mobs Skulls way more frequently than they would normally drop. Only vanilla Skulls are available though.

quests.name: Water Walter
quests.description:
Craft a Water Mill! This machine generates GP passively when there is flowing water on any of its sides.

This generator has been nerfed, and generates 1/4x the normal amount.

quests.name: Blows like the Wind
quests.description: Craft an OpenBlocks Fan! When powered by redstone, it blows any entity away. Useful for a mob farm, although the Mob Fan is even better.

quests.name: Suck 'em all up!
quests.description: Craft an Open Blocks Vacuum Hopper! This machine can suck up items and experience orbs from a range. You can also set output sides for each.

quests.name: Craft of Evil
quests.description: Drops of Evil are no longer dropped by Wither Skeletons, they're instead crafted. So craft one! And use it to turn sorrounding Grass into Cursed Earth! This type of soil makes mobs spawn constantly, so it's perfect for a mob farm. Just watch out, don't let it burn.

quests.name: Vibrant and Bzooing
quests.description: Craft a Resonator! This is the most important Extra Utilities machine. You'll need GP Generating machines in order to use it. You might want to consider crafting multiple Resonators for automation.

quests.name: Solar Sally
quests.description: Craft some Solar Panels! Simply placing one down will generate 1 GP in the daytime.

quests.name: Repair ALL the things!
quests.description: Craft an Auto Anvil! You can automatically insert tools & armor to repair  them using liquid experience.

quests.name: Blow higher!
quests.description: Craft a Mob Fan Height Modifier! You can apply at most 3 of these to your Mob Fan.

quests.name: Blow farther!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Fan Distance Modifiers! You can apply at most 10 of these to your Mob Fan.

quests.name: Harden up
quests.description: Craft an Extra Utilities Machine Block! This is the base for all Extra Utilities machines.

quests.name: Sharp like Bisharp's horn
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Sharpness Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will make the Masher generally deal more damage to all things.

quests.name: It's hot! It's hot!
quests.description: Craft a Thermal Conductor Rod! This item lets your craft RF Dust which ultimately lets you get into Thermal Expansion.

quests.name: I want my items HERE!
quests.description:
Craft a Transfer Node for Items and a Transfer Pipe! This a highly upgradable and filterable item routing mechanism, that's definitely much better than Itemducts when fully upgraded. To do so, use Extra Utilities Speed and Stack Upgrades, or Filters.

Another advantage is that you can route items, fluids & energy all on the same singlular pipe. But of course, you'll have to filter on the recieving end.

quests.name: Power of the Sun
quests.description: Use materials from your Enchanter to create a Sun Crystal! Throw it on the ground for a while to fill it up with sunlight. Consider a way to automate this process for the future.

quests.name: A cylinder! A sphere!
quests.description:
Craft a Building Guide! This block can help you build nice geometric shapes. Use the arrows on top to swap between different shapes. Use the plus and minus signs on the sides to increase or decrease the side of your build. Then power it with a redstone signal to make ghost blocks appear.

You can also upgrade it into an Enhanced Building Guide to get some more available shapes.

quests.name: Winding Winston
quests.description:
Make a Wind Mill! Tis machine passively generates GP if there is nothing blocking its northern and southern sides. It generates more in the rain.

This generator has been buffed and generates 2x the normal amount.

quests.name: Blow wider!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Fan Width Modifiers! These are likely the most useful upgrades, and you can apply at most 3 of these to your Mob Fan.

quests.name: 3rd way to smelt
quests.description: Yet another Furnace, eh? Well, this one can be pretty speedy with Extra Utilities Speed Upgrades!

quests.name: Ultimate Velocity
quests.description: Craft at least one Ultimate Speed Upgrade. This makes machines even faster, and it can stack up to 64. You might need that speed for something in the lategame, but be aware that it'll use a lot of GP.

quests.name: It steel hurts
quests.description: Craft some Wooden, Stone and finally Iron Spikes! This damages any mob standing on top of right besides it. Great for a mob farm!

quests.name: How fast can it go!?
quests.description: Craft at least one Magical Speed Upgrade! This makes machines even faster, and it can stack up to 16 instead of just 4. However, be aware that your machines will use even more GP when upgraded with higher-tier Speed Upgrades.

quests.name: Upgrading? Upgrading?
quests.description: Craft a couple Upgrade Bases! These can be crafted into Speed, Stack, and Mining Upgrades.

quests.name: Glass that can't be Effed
quests.description: Craft some Ineffable and Dark Ineffable Glass. While players can, mobs can't travel through these blocks, which makes them useful for mob farm or mob spawner walls, as well as general base doors. The regular one does let light through, the dark one doesn't. So mobs will be able to spawn inside when you use the dark variants.

quests.name: Show them the Nether!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Fire Aspect Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will set all mobs on fire that are touched by the Masher. Perfect for Cooked Porkchops!

quests.name: Mobs aren't a Fan of this
quests.description: Upgrade your OpenBlocks Fan into a Mob Fan! When powered by redstone, this machine blows mobs with great strength, and it's the perfect way to move mobs off your spawning platform. Additionally, it's highly upgradable, and with max upgrades you'll surely only need at most one per platform.

quests.name: Die!(monds)
quests.description: These fellahs deal a lot of damage...! So why not craft some?

quests.name: Fiery Fred
quests.description:
Craft a Fire Mill! This machine generates GP passively while over an active Fire block. Use Netherrack below.

This generator has been buffed and it generates 4x the normal amount.

quests.name: Getting faster
quests.description:
Craft a couple Seed Upgrades, and one Stack & Mining Upgrade.

- Speed Upgrades increase a machine's speed or a Transfer Node's transfer rate.
- One Stack Upgrade makes it so the Transfer Node sends a stack of items at once, instead of individual ones.
- The Mining Upgrade is similar to the 1.7 World Interaction Upgrade. It mines Cobblestone when placed inside a Transfer Node which is over a full block with Water and Lava source blocks on the side.

quests.name: Don't leave any items floatin'
quests.description: Craft a couple Absorption Range Upgrades to increase the range of your Absorption Hopper! You can use at most 6 of these.

quests.name: Nice, in my Open-ion
quests.description: Craft some Open Ingots! These are used in a number of Open Blocks machines.

quests.name: It's your Lucky Day!
quests.description: Craft some Mob Masher Looting Upgrades. You can insert at most 10 of these in the machine. This will make the Masher drop more loot.
